answers.answer: I have it.  I found out at 35 wks I didn't have any symptoms

I have had really sweet smelling pee for the last few days... I have heard that the sweet smell in urin is linked to the kidneys... I don't know if I should call my ob today or if I should be ok to wait.

question: Has anyone ever had gestational diabetes, when they were pregnant?  How did u find out and what were ur symptoms??
title: gestational diabetes
